subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd spurred his team by scoring 8 of his 14 points in the fourth quarter, and added 10 rebounds and 10 assists in the Nets’ season-opening victory over the Toronto Raptors.
snippet: Jason Kidd spurred his team by scoring 8 of his 14 points in the fourth quarter, and added 10 rebounds and 10 assists in the Nets’ season-opening victory over the Toronto Raptors.
